issues.description: SVG icons have invalid path data - they contain text like 'd="zap"', 'd="shield-check"', 'd="layers"' instead of actual SVG path coordinates. Icons will not render.
issues.suggestion: Replace icon path data with actual SVG paths from Lucide, Heroicons, or similar icon library. For example, 'zap' should be a proper lightning bolt path.

issues.description: Features section contains duplicate content - the same 6 features are listed twice, once with broken icon paths and again with generic Heroicon paths.
issues.suggestion: Remove the duplicate feature blocks. Keep only one set of 6 features with working icons.

issues.description: Business name displays as 'Home Page' in navigation and page title instead of 'Glendor' or 'Glendor PHI Sanitizer'.
issues.suggestion: Replace all instances of 'Home Page' with 'Glendor' in the nav brand text and page title.

issues.description: Features section headline is grammatically broken: 'Everything you need to One Solution for Every Medical Data Type' - appears to be concatenated template text.
issues.suggestion: Fix to read simply: 'One Solution for Every Medical Data Type'

issues.description: Hero headline structure is awkward - 'PHI Sanitization That Never Leaves Your Network' followed by standalone 'Never Leaves' creates redundant, confusing text.
issues.suggestion: Either highlight 'Never Leaves' within the main headline or restructure to avoid repetition.

issues.description: Navigation includes link to '#testimonials' but testimonials section was removed. Also 'Watch Demo' button links to '#demo' which doesn't exist.
issues.suggestion: Remove 'Testimonials' from nav. Change demo button to link to '#cta' or remove it.

issues.description: Secondary CTA 'Download Technical Overview' was not mentioned in original research - may not exist.
issues.suggestion: Verify this asset exists or change to 'Get in Touch' which aligns with original CTAs.

issues.description: No visible contact information, company address, or social media links despite research showing physical address in Draper, UT.
issues.suggestion: Add footer with contact info: '13894 S Bangerter Pkwy Suite 200, Draper, UT 84020' and contact form link.

issues.description: Awards and trust signals from research (HIMSS25 Winner, Digital Health Awards) are not displayed anywhere on the page.
issues.suggestion: Add a trust signals section or badges showing 'HIMSS25 Innovation Winner' and 'Digital Health Awards Quarterfinalist'.

strengths: Copy accurately represents Glendor's core value proposition and technical capabilities
Professional healthcare-industry tone with appropriate terminology (PHI, BAA, at-source)
Benefits section effectively uses 'Status Quo vs. Glendor' comparison format from original brand voice
How It Works section provides clear 4-step process explanation
Footer tagline 'On a quest to safeguard patients' privacy' correctly pulled from research
Responsive Tailwind structure should work well on mobile devices
Color scheme (#6aad8e green) extracted appropriately from brand
summary: The copy quality is strong and accurately represents Glendor's PHI sanitization offering, but the HTML implementation has critical rendering issues. Broken SVG icons and duplicate feature blocks will make the page look unprofessional. The 'Home Page' placeholder text appearing as the business name is a significant oversight. These are likely template/generation bugs rather than content issues. The page cannot ship without fixing the icons and removing duplicates.
